data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
An extension to the Test::Builder family of testing modules
    (currently Test::Simple, Test::More and Test::Differences) to enable
    easier testing of code that throws exceptions.

    Test::Exception supplies a few functions that make the testing of
    exception conditions explicit, and provides more intelligent
    diagnostic messages on failure. Works with the other Test::Builder
    based modules.
